about_the_game:
An intriguing new subplot fully integrated into The Next World's story campaign, providing a path towards building a new Exodus ship, featuring new mechanics and new possibilities.

Of course, with your resources still critically limited, the biggest question is... Can you do this? And who will you have to leave behind?

Rocketship DLC is compatible with both base TNW and Planetary Exploration, and can be enabled or disabled as you choose when starting a new campaign.
